text:
@marcorubio @realDonaldTrump Wrong side of history Marco. Let's look at the current record, courtesy of Jeff Tiedrich:  
                           
40,000,000 unemployed
2,525,900 infected
125,545 killed by coronavirus
429 killed by cops
20 killed by Putin-backed Afghan militants
1 asshole golfing
